description:
This course teaches you complete Hadoop Cluster Administration skills

from a beginner level to an expert. Starts with understanding of Big data which is a buzzword in the Industry now and will go through Hadoop Cluster setup with SIngle node and multinode.

  • The first Online Course on Hadoop Administration who worked on Hadoop for more than 5 years
  • Unix/Linux/DBA/Windows admins can take the course who want to make career in Hadoop
  • Students who are new to UNIX/Linux environment can also take the course
  • Teaches complete course using a single node and Multinode Cluster Setup in practical
  • 8+ Hours of Video lecture content with 13 sections-
  • Covers Topics including basic UNIX Commands for those who are new to UNIX/LInux- Covers Topics including Cluster monitoring tools like Nagios and Ganglia
title: Master Hadoop Cluster Administration
